description.value: Scenario 6.x - Send MedicationData for G. XXX_Hemsbergen.
Specifies the query to run and general checks on the request.
Test client to POST a Bundle of type transaction.
Checks if all resources specified by the scenario can be identified unambiguously.
Confirm that the request Bundle contains 1 MedicationDispense resource(s) that reference(s) Medication with coding '1101099|urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' (MIZOLLEN TABLET MGA 10MG)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as MedicationDispense).where(medication.resolve().code.where(coding.count() = 2 and coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '16705') and coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1' and code = '73466'))).count() = 1
